scripts.dev: yarn docker:stop; OTEL_EXPORTER_JAEGER_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:14268/api/traces yarn nodemon --inspect src/index.js | yarn pino-pretty -c -t
scripts.docker:cleanup: echo '=> Deleting existing container...'; (docker rm $(docker ps -a -q --filter ancestor=app-node-js)) &>/dev/null || echo '=> No container to delete.'
scripts.docker:debug: yarn docker:stop; yarn docker:debug:build && yarn docker:debug:start && yarn docker:logs
scripts.docker:dev: yarn docker:stop; yarn docker:dev:build && yarn docker:dev:start && yarn docker:logs
scripts.docker:dev:build: docker build --target dev --build-arg node_version=$npm_package_engines_node --build-arg node_env=development -t app-node-js .
scripts.docker:logs: docker logs $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=app-node-js) -f | yarn pino-pretty -c -t
scripts.docker:prod: yarn docker:stop; yarn docker:prod:build && yarn docker:prod:start && yarn docker:logs
scripts.docker:stop: echo '=> Stopping existing container...'; (docker stop $(docker ps -a -q --filter ancestor=app-node-js)) &>/dev/null || echo '=> No container to stop.'
scripts.jaeger:init: docker start jaeger || (echo '=> No Jaeger container detected, creating new one...' && docker run -d --name jaeger -e COLLECTOR_ZIPKIN_HOST_PORT=:9411 -p 5775:5775/udp -p 6831:6831/udp -p 6832:6832/udp -p 5778:5778 -p 16686:16686 -p 14268:14268 -p 14250:14250 -p 9411:9411 jaegertracing/all-in-one:latest)
